TopicTitle: Modded the Mainsail and the X200-32, and....

Articles.Content:
I set the Mainsail's thrust to something like 15 gigaNewtons. Within 5 minutes, I was out of the "galaxy".

Also, an EVA at the "edge of the Universe":
You weren't even out of the solar system. There's no way to escape Kerbol's SOI.
Whats up with the MET? You went back in time?

Whats up with the MET? You went back in time?

Relativity my friend.

Whats up with the MET? You went back in time?

He must have hit 88mph

Whats up with the MET? You went back in time?

I didn't know KSP modeled relativity! XD

EDIT: Got ninja'd hardcore

What's more, it happens every time I use the Kraken Danny (the name of the engine; I actually made a new part) . I have mastered time travel in KSP, guys. I have found a hole in Keinstien's theory of relativity. Also, the folder in game data I have the engine in is called Danny Moment.

EDIT: the MET stopped there. Someone please give this to Danny. Link to the parts: [coming tomorrow morning]. Danny will exploit this.

Edited April 21, 2014 by Sun

What's more, it happens every time I use the Kraken Danny (the name of the engine; I actually made a new part) . I have mastered time travel in KSP, guys. I have found a hole in Keinstien's theory of relativity. Also, the folder in game data I have the engine in is called Danny Moment.

EDIT: the MET stopped there. Someone please give this to Danny. Link to the parts: [coming tomorrow morning]. Danny will exploit this.

Nah, he only plays stock.

Traveling at 0.62c there, I see. Yeah, you'd still have to travel for quite a while to escape the sun's SOI. Our own sun's SOI is estimated to be over a light-year in diameter, and I'm sure you can do the math on that one.
Wait, doesn't relativity make your time pass slower than everybody else's? If so you would travel forwards in time, not backwards. He must be travelling backwards, haha!

You call that fast ???

*is very tempted to link youtube video made by self*

Wait, doesn't relativity make your time pass slower than everybody else's? If so you would travel forwards in time, not backwards. He must be travelling backwards, haha!

If the ship exceeded the speed of light, time could run backward. It must be made of tachyons.
